issue.title: [CI] Quarkus main fails with Java 21 mandrel build of mandrel/23.1 on Linux

labels.name: testing
labels.description: CI and testing related issues and PRs

repository.name: mandrel
repository.description: Mandrel is a downstream distribution of the GraalVM community edition. Mandrel's main goal is to provide a native-image release specifically to support Quarkus.

issue.body:
Automatic issue reporting for mandrel 23.1 on Linux

Replacement of https://github.com/graalvm/mandrel/issues/563 (to not require special repository permissions for opening/closing the issue)
